metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Bodies has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Bodies has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Phrygian,  and C Locrian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
